title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Here every blackguard might, for subscribing sixpence or a shilling, indulge himself by announcingit to be a contribution from an enemy of BlackJack or King John, or whatever impertinent nickname he chose to bestow on an accomplished,simple-hearted, and most honourable man, eminentfor his own acquirements as well as for the delightwhich he had afforded the public.
